content: a starry christmas tree give your home a proper christmas make over with this lovely set of ornaments a garland and a cover for your christmas tree crocheted in our favorite yarn to use for christmas items durable glam this set promises to deliver a sparkly christmas yarn durable glam 75 % cotton and 25 % polyester 50g/130m/ 142yd yarn a 2172 cream 8 balls of which 7 for the christmas tree cover and 1 ball for the garland and ornaments yarn b 2208 cayenne 4 balls of which 3 for the christmas tree cover and 1 ball for the garland and ornaments yarn c 2210 gold 1 ball yarn d 2181 ochre 1 ball
